Summary: Star moving with fish in current swimming movements.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Chesterfield
There were no other sightings in Chesterfield on or around June 14th 2009
divs: sighting detailsparked in chesterfield valley off 109 to star gaze for a few minutes. beautiful evening-slight breeze ~65 degrees. some clouds.2\3rds moon. spent time looking westwordly as airport and moon light tend to wash out the sky. noticed an airplane travelin northeast about 1 oclock watched it clear the shy- noticed another but after they cleared the sky- i saw a star like object moving. it was about 3 oclock in the sky or twelve fingers off the horizon. with a few clouds moving just below this stars elevation - i wanted to check my vision. i extended my arms placing one hand on top of the other looking at my palms so each finger stacked. just above the twelf finger- was this star- it moved left aproximately the length of my index finger and at 180 degrees it moved back twice that length- the lateral movements were fast- then it moved up like a swimming fish to the center then drifted back down to the original line of sight off the horizon. kind of a triangular pattern or area covered. it did seem to back away from earth or deeper into space for a bit but came right back to this plane. it was colored like a star white with a faint tail that could be eye distortion. it showed more when moving about. it did emit yellow for a moment and at one stop that lazor orange red-it did not change shape- i was hopin it would change into that redball that some of these on film do. not this time.. the clouds started commin in and obscurin the view so i packed up and am extreamly greatful for the glimpse- next nice nite ill spend sometime watchin again. foot note if some one else saw the same thing- i thought i saw a bar of light to the left of this triangular flight area two or three times- it looked like a picture of tracer round placed in the sky except white light. something firing in this things direction?? poor shooting, it appeared the fight pattern distance to the left. also did not continue the trail only like a picture of one placed in the sky- just a crack of lightbar in the sky. might have been eyeballs playin tricks as they were workin pretty hard to watch this star move around. would like to have second opinion to verify light bar activity- star movin is factual. ive been watchin a lot of film of ufo activity over the years- im kinda curious if these light balls are life forms themselves or imprints of activity from another demension touching ours.
